features: CREAMY LATHER: Uppercut Deluxe Shave Cream quickly builds up a creamy lather for the closest and most comfortable shave.
PREVENT RAZOR BURN: The bespoke, comforting complex helps to prevent razor burn and hydrate the skins.
SUITABLE FOR DRY AND SENSITIVE SKIN: The unique formula hydrates the skin making this shave cream ideal for those with dry and sensitive skin.
SHAVE PRODUCTS: Use in combination with our Exfoliating Cleanser and Hydrating Moisturizer.
UPPERCUT DELUXE: A modern yet traditional approach to mens grooming, made with high quality ingredients.
body.description: Deluxe Shave Cream Experience the ultimate shaving experience with Uppercut Deluxe Shave Cream. Crafted to perfection, our premium Australian-made shave cream ensures a luxurious and smooth shave like never before. Unleash the power of precision and comfort with a product that embodies the true essence of classic barber style grooming. Discover the art of shaving with Uppercut Deluxe Shave Cream. How to use Wet your face with warm water to prepare your skin.Apply Shave Cream to your fingertips and massage it onto your damp face in circular motions to create a rich lather.Shave in the direction of hair growth for a comfortable and close shave.Rinse face thoroughly with cold water to close the pores.Complete your grooming routine with Uppercut Deluxe Hydrating Moisturizer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Deluxe Shave Cream Experience the ultimate shaving experience with Uppercut Deluxe Shave Cream. Crafted to perfection, our premium Australian-made shave cream ensures a luxurious and smooth shave like never before. Unleash the power of precision and comfort with a product that embodies the true essence of classic barber style grooming. Discover the art of shaving with Uppercut Deluxe Shave Cream. How to use Wet your face with warm water to prepare your skin.Apply Shave Cream to your fingertips and massage it onto your damp face in circular motions to create a rich lather.Shave in the direction of hair growth for a comfortable and close shave.Rinse face thoroughly with cold water to close the pores.Complete your grooming routine with Uppercut Deluxe Hydrating Moisturizer. Produces a rich, creamy lather for a close, comfortable shave. Designed to protect dry and sensitive skin types. Contains Allantoin to soothe skin under stress. Lathers with a brush or hands. Deeply nourishing to reduce irritation making it ideal for dry and/or sensitive skin. Suitable for everyday use. Fragrance: Cyprus & Cedar.

Shave Cream Clear Shave Gel Exfoliating Cleanser Hydrating Moisturizer Aftershave Cologne Skin Type Dry or Sensitive Skin Normal or Oily Skin All Skin Types All Skin Types All Skin Types, especially Sensitive Skin Benefits Lathers up for a clean and close shave for irritated or stressed skin. Provides a transparent, smooth guide for a precise shave to cool and soothe normal and oily skin. Gently exfoliates, cleanses & detoxifies. Soothes & hydrates. Mild astringent included for post shaving. Low alcohol formula makes it ideal for sensitive skin. Scent Cyprus & Cedar Cyprus & Cedar Cyprus & Cedar Mandarin, Patchouli & Spice ‘North’ blend; a masculine mix of woody base notes and fresh hints of citrus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Here is my comparison of the clear shave gel versus this deluxe shave cream…
reviews.reviewText: I have recently used both the deluxe shave cream, and the clear shave gel, both from this Uppercut Deluxe brand. While they are both good products, they are quite different from each other, and I do have a definite preference between the two products, which I will explain… I do frequently shave with both types, specifically I shave with shaving creams that both do and do not not work best with use of a shaving brush, as well as shaving gels like this one.The shaving cream is mildly scented and has a traditional masculine scent which is mild, and somewhere between a barbershop scent and a medicinal shave cream scent. The scent is pleasant. It is not an overpowering scent. The shave cream applies easily, but not does not spread readily without use of a shave brush. With warm water and use of a good shaving brush, the cream does spread readily, but I still did not quite get as good of a lather as I prefer. The shave with this cream was fine, but the cream did not lubricate my shave as well as some creams do.In contrast, the clear shave gel is much easier to apply, it spreads more easily, and does not need the use of a shave brush. The shave gel is clear, as advertised, and is nearly colorless. It does have a light blue hue, but I do not appreciate any color once it is applied to the skin. This nearly invisible shave gel can be particularly useful when you want to see areas that you are shaving more clearly, particularly for any detail shaving. A downside of a completely clear gel is that it can make it more difficult to know where you have already shaved. When you apply a lather to your face, it is easy to see where you have shaved away the lather, but this gel does not provide that visual aid. But it is easy enough to shave in a pattern that allows you to know that you have covered all areas. This gel version provides better lubrication for the shave blade than the cream does. The scent is light and clean and masculine. Between the two, I have a definite preference for this clear shave gel, and that is despite my preference to have my shave cream/gel to have a little lather so that it is more clear where you have and have not yet shaved. The gel provides a very nice shaving experience, and while the shave cream is fine, I definitely prefer the shave gel, mostly because of how easy it is to apply and how well it lubricates the shave for a smoother shaving experience.. I hope some of this information is helpful for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ever used noxzema? This is exactly the same in my opinion! Especially the scent!I think it works well and is very smooth to apply. I appreciate shaving creams in this type of container! Very sturdy and easy to throw in a bag with no worries of leaking

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I tried this product along with two others from the same range (shave gel, exfoliating cleanser) and this one was my least favorite.To start, it didn’t arrive particularly well-sealed. The container was wrapped in plastic, but the interior of the container only had a flimsy foam circle to contain the foam. It fell off when I unscrewed the cap to the container, and it was clear it had moved a lot in transit. There was some residue inside the container lid (pictured).The foam itself didn’t create much of a lather when applied and I had to use quite a bit to cover my face. On the plus side, it did help me to have a smooth shave, although not as much as the shave gel.Lastly, I don’t love the scent. It’s sort of woodsy and earthy, but not fresh. I understand this comes down to personal taste for the most part, but it wasn’t really what I’d expect from a fresh, clean shave. It also smelled stronger with this product than the others.Given the price tag at the time of this review ($20), I expected more. Personally, I’d skip this one and go with the shaving gel instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Fails to Lather Worth a Hoot
reviews.reviewText: After using a different shaving cream for years, I thought I'd try something new, so I bought Uppercut. That was a mistake.The main problem is that the Uppercut fails to lather. At all. I use a badger-hair brush and lather bowl. I continue to try the appropriate way to get a lather, and I get a slimy paste with any hint of lather. It's so bad I just ordered a new container of my previous shaving cream, which worked much better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A little goes a long way
reviews.reviewText: The Deluxe Shave Cream is kind of a wet paste consistency. A little goes a long way, so I would start with a size that might cover a nickel and rub it in. It takes some getting used to - I tried an application of the paste consistency full strength and immediately shaved vs. adding a splatter of water and rubbing into a lather. I prefer the latter approach because it's an easier shave. The full paste approach without any dilution tends to feel more like I'm shaving through something similar to the consistency of a hand cream moisturizing lotion.I have a heavy beard and found that the closeness of the shave to be comparable to another popular brand of shaving lotion. I never experience any razor burn or nicks when using this cream and my skin does feel moisturized afterwards. Also, I find that this product may be best suited for travel instead of lugging along a larger and heavier can of shaving lotion.
